name: Wakatoshi
skill: Restores 1691/2071 HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive 30/37% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Slightly increases the EXP gained from battle.

additional_data.description: A spirit who visits every home at the beginning of the New Year. One of the many visiting gods. Chronos is her colleague, and his time-controlling power makes it possible for gods such as her to visit every home in a seemingly short time. Despite her very young look, she is attentive and dependable, and even Chronos, who is critical of everyone, trusts her. Some say she has the emotional maturity of Mikado (when Mikado is being serious and reliable, that is).
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Event: Defeat LVL 60, 70, 140, 180 Belphegor
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Event: Random drops after LVL 60.
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Get a Second Half Ranking of 1000 and above.
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Get a Second Half Ranking of 2501~6000.
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Get a Total Ranking of 7500 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the total Event Points during the "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" event.

main: "Here I am to bring happiness to everyone."
skill: "I won't let anything take everyone's happiness away."
summon: "Let's work together during the next New Year."
